Name: Razer
PhasesDescription: Starts in Phase I, then moves up a phase at the start of each around, looping back to Phase I after III.

Actions.Name: Swat
Actions.Description: A foe in range 2 must save or be shoved 3 and shattered. On a successful save, they are shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Aether Split
Actions.AreaEffect: Deal 2 damage to all foes, then teleport 2.

Actions.Name: Eruption
Actions.Description: A Rock spire in range 5 emits a close blast 1 pool of blight. Adjacent characters take 2 damage. The spire gains aura 1, which is difficult terrain.

Actions.Name: Soar
Actions.Description: Fly 3 spaces in a straight line.

Actions.Name: Scorch
Actions.Description: Choose a character in range 6. At the end of that character's turn, the Razer shoots an energy blast at them for a blast 1 explosion area effect.
Actions.AreaEffect: Characters within must save. On a successful save, they take [D]+[fray]. On a failed save they take 2[D]+[fray]. Rock spires in the area are destroyed.

Phases.Description: As phase I and II, but:
